Advance.name: Advance
Advance.description:
Maneuver

Your army attempts to close the distance with a target enemy army it is not engaged with by attempting a @Check[type:reflex|traits:action:advance]{Maneuver} check.

大成功s The enemy army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} with your army, even if it previously had the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]{Distant} condition (in which case it loses that condition and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged}).

成功 If the target army is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]{Distant}, it loses that condition; otherwise, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged}. 

失败 Your army’s attempt to advance fails.

大失败 Your army’s attempt to advance fails, and it becomes disorganized, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.HbNAT8XxZD1OWMwE]{Mired 1} until the start of its next turn.

All-Out Assault.name: All-Out Assault
All-Out Assault.description:
Cavalry Infantry

需求: Merciless

Your army attacks with frightening vigor. Attempt a melee Strike against an enemy army’s AC.

大成功s Your army inflicts [[/r 3]] points of damage to the target army. If your army’s next war action this turn is an attack war action against a different target army, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the Strike as your fury continues to the new target.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.zhHqV6jF0xhSADQT]{All-Out Assault (大成功s)}

成功 Your army deals [[/r 2]] points of damage to the target army.

失败 Your army falters, but still deals [[/r 1]] point of damage to the target army.

大失败 Your army deals no damage to the target army and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the start of its next turn.

Battle.name: Battle
Battle.description:
Your army attacks an enemy army with a Strike against the enemy army’s AC. You can do so with a melee Strike only if you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} with the target army. Otherwise, you must use a ranged Strike. An army can attempt a maximum of 5 ranged Strikes per war encounter (unless it has the Increased Ammunition tactic). As with any attack, multiple Strikes in a single round suffer a multiple attack penalty. A siege engine can use the Battle action to attack and damage a fortification. 

大成功s You deal [[/r 2]] points of damage to the army.

成功 You deal [[/r 1]] point of damage to the army.

Battlefield Medicine.name: Battlefield Medicine
Battlefield Medicine.description:
Infantry Skirmisher

需求 Field Triage

Your army attempts to patch up an allied army’s wounds during battle.  Once you attempt this war action on an army, that army is temporarily immune to Battlefield Medicine for the remainder of the war encounter. Attempt a @Check[type:perception|dc:25|traits:action:battlefield-medicine]{Scouting} check to successfully sort the army’s wounded and provide swift aid.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.EUy6bVHHOrE5tVm3]{Battlefield Medicine Immunity}

大成功s You restore [[/r 2]] HP to the target army.

成功 You restore [[/r 1]] HP to the target army

大失败 Your attempt to heal the army fails, and that army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.eIQC69sOPbHAGxHC]{Weary} condition value increases by 1.

Counterattack.name: Counterattack
Counterattack.description:
Infantry Skirmisher

需求 Flexible Tactics

Trigger An army you are engaged with attempts a maneuver war action.

Your army lashes out at the foe as they attempt to perform a maneuver. Attempt a melee Strike against the triggering army’s AC. Counterattack doesn’t count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn’t apply to this Strike.

大成功s You inflict [[/r 1]] point of damage on the army and increase its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken} condition value by 1.

成功 You inflict [[/r 1]] point of damage on the army.

Covering Fire.name: Covering Fire
Covering Fire.description:
Cavalry Infantry Skirmisher

需求: Sharpshooter

Your army’s ranged fire provides cover and protection for an allied army to maneuver. Attempt a ranged Strike against a target army’s AC.

大成功s You inflict [[/r 2]] points of damage to the target army, and it cannot take reactions triggered by maneuver war actions from any army until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.hGZBni0wBdgBo6mA]{Covering Fire (大成功s)}

成功 You inflict [[/r 1]] point of damage to the target army, and it can’t take reactions triggered by maneuver war actions from any army until the start of your next turn. 

失败 Your attack fails to provide covering fire, but you inflict [[/r 1]] point of damage to the target army.

大失败 Your attempt fails.

Defensive Stance.name: Defensive Stance
Defensive Stance.description:
Infantry Maneuver

需求 Defensive Tactics

Your army hunkers down behind its shields, presents pole arms in a wall of blades, or moves into position to protect a target allied army that is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked}. Attempt a @Check[type:reflex|traits:action:defensive-stance]{Maneuver} check against an enemy army.

大成功s The target allied army is no longer @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} by any army.

成功 The target allied army is no longer @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} by the target army.

大失败 Your defensive stance fails, and your army is now @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} by the target enemy army.

Dirty Fighting.name: Dirty Fighting
Dirty Fighting.description:
Skirmisher

需求 Flexible Tactics

Your army uses trickery, deception, and unfair tactics to attempt a devastating attack against an outflanked army. Attempt a melee Strike or a ranged Strike against the AC of a target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} army that is not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]{Distant}.

大成功s The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.eIQC69sOPbHAGxHC]{Weary 2} until the start of your next turn.

成功 The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.eIQC69sOPbHAGxHC]{Weary 1} until the start of your next turn.

大失败 Your attack deals no damage to the target army, which is emboldened by your failed attempt at dirty fighting. This reduces the target army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.eIQC69sOPbHAGxHC]{Weary} value by 1.

Disengage.name: Disengage
Disengage.description:
Maneuver

Your army attempts to disengage from enemy armies to put some distance between itself and the enemy. Attempt a @Check[type:reflex|traits:action:disengage]{Maneuver} check against each army your army is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} with. 

大成功s Your army is no longer engaged with the target army. In addition, your army is automatically no longer engaged with any armies you haven’t yet rolled a Maneuver check against during this war action.

成功 Your army breaks free and is no longer engaged with the target army.

失败 Your army remains engaged with the target army.

大失败 Your army remains engaged with the target army and, for the remainder of this turn, your army cannot attempt to disengage from any army with which it is still @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged}.

False Retreat.name: False Retreat
False Retreat.description:
Infantry Morale Skirmisher

需求 Flexible Tactics

Trigger Your army succeeds at a morale check.

Your army feigns defeat to trick an enemy army. Attempt a @Check[type:will|traits:action:false-retreat]{Morale} check against a target army.

大成功s The target army is caught off guard by your army’s deception. It becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} and is unable to take reactions until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.j7RCpCggLJw9Kf2l]{False Retreat (大成功s)}

成功 The target army is caught off guard by your army’s deception and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the start of its next turn.

大失败 The enemy anticipated your tactic and moves to take advantage of the situation. Your army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the start of your next turn.

Feint.name: Feint
Feint.description:
Infantry Skirmisher

需求 Flexible Tactics

Your army launches a probing attack meant to trick the enemy into thinking you are attacking from one quarter while your real thrust comes elsewhere.

大成功s The target army’s defenses are thrown off; it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the end of your turn. 

成功 The target army is fooled, but only momentarily. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} against the next melee Strike your army attempts against it before the end of your current turn.

大失败 The enemy anticipates your feint and presses the advantage. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} by the target army until the end of your next turn.

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description:
Maneuver

Your army spends a war action to adopt a defensive pose—raising shields, focusing on parrying attacks, or seeking cover. Attempt a @Check[type:reflex|traits:action:guard]{Maneuver} check against a target army.

大成功s Your army gains a +2 item bonus to its AC until the start of your next turn; this bonus applies to all attacks against this army, not just from the targeted army.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.4aMsfeRodXmVm5HY]{Guard (大成功s)}

成功 Your army gains a +2 item bonus to its AC until the start of your next turn against attacks from the target army.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-effects.Item.X1ISHY0CaPXIsusg]{Guard (成功)}

失败 Your army fails to guard against the target army.

大失败 Your army fails spectacularly to guard against the target army and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.HbNAT8XxZD1OWMwE]{Mired 1}.

Outflank.name: Outflank
Outflank.description:
Cavalry Maneuver Skirmisher

需求 Reckless Flankers, you aren’t @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} 

You send your army around an enemy’s flank to get a better attacking position and to push your enemy into disorder. Attempt a @Check[type:reflex|traits:action:outflank]{Maneuver} check against the target army. 

大成功s The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the start of your next turn. You can choose to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} with that army or not.

成功 The target army is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the start of your next turn. You are now @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.1p98vHZNFYttifsn]{Engaged} with that army.

大失败 You underestimate the target army’s position, and the blunder causes your army to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the start of your next turn.

Overwhelming Bombardment.name: Overwhelming Bombardment
Overwhelming Bombardment.description:
Siege

需求 Explosive Shot 

Your siege engines focus all their fire on a fortification. This war action counts as using two ranged Strikes for the purposes of depleting an army’s shots. Attempt a ranged Strike against the target fortification’s AC.

大成功s You deal [[/r 2]] points of damage to the fortification. You also deal [[/r 1]] point of damage to up to two armies of your choice that are within the fortification.

成功 You deal [[/r 1]] point of damage to the fortification, and an additional [[/r 1]] point of damage either to the fortification or to an army within the fortification (your choice of which).

失败 You deal [[/r 1]] damage to the fortification. 

大失败 You deal no damage, and your army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.3Zcj5sBiZXKzd8hu]{Outflanked} until the start of its next turn.

Rally.name: Rally
Rally.description:
Morale

Your army’s leaders attempt to bolster the soldiers’ morale and fight back the effects of fear and panic. Attempt a @Check[type:will|traits:action:rally]{Morale} check against a target enemy army of your choice.

大成功s If your army is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.vUthCxz9am3slVR1]{Routed}, it loses the routed condition. 

Reduce your army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken} condition by 2.

成功 Reduce your army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken} condition by 1.

大失败 Your attempt to rally backfires—increase your army’s  @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken} condition by 1.

Retreat.name: Retreat
Retreat.description:
Prerequisites Your army is not engaged.

Your army tries to escape from the battlefield. If your army is already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]{Distant}, it flees the battlefield, is no longer part of the war encounter, and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.vUthCxz9am3slVR1]{Routed}. Otherwise, your army gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.g899cTZQJdXwN6Zu]{Distant} condition.

Taunt.name: Taunt
Taunt.description:
Morale

需求: Focused Devotion

Your army attempts to frighten and cow an enemy army. Attempt a @Check[type:will|traits:action:taunt]{Morale} check against the target army.

大成功s The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken 2} until the start of your next turn.

成功 The target army becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken 1} until the start of your next turn.

大失败 Your failed attempt bolsters the enemy’s spirits. This  reduces the target army’s @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-kingmaker-tools.kingmaker-tools-army-conditions.Item.LRcdpNTi2OE0LmHD]{Shaken} value by 1.
